title: Update failed?! Why?!
body:
So basically, when I try to get on League, before i'm even able to launch it, it attempts to update, then it says.
Update failed.
Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.
I attempted to use the Hextech Repair Tool, and I didn't find anything in the logs, and I attempted to have League search my folders, and that didn't work, so i'm kinda stuck.

replies.body: Send a support ticket with the logs, or pastebin the logs/post in help and support.
If you post this on **Help & Support** they will be able to assist you there.
